channel.title: Princess Flirt Buff
channel.description:
To me, flirt as Princess is vague too the point of not being useful. Will-O-Wisp is a good investigative ability, but vaguely knowing what my target could be doesn't help. Usually evils claim something in the same category or related category anyways. I would suggest a small buff:
Princess (Blue Dragon Investigative)
Passive: Royal Blood
Night Ability: Flirt: Determine your target's class type.
Will-O-Wisp: You and your target will see who visited you last night.
Note: I would keep Special/Investigative Category

item.title: Princess Flirt Buff
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
NightX:

I have never seen a Princess out someone

Maybe because they are bad players?
Alot of MM players don’t claim sheriff/princess because thats almost like claiming MM those days. I prefer to claim physician/CW.
The real princess can find the MM with a flirt day1-3, while sheriffs can’t.

Tip: when u find a special/invest you can say on chat: “prince jail me please”.
then the prince can jail the special/invest the following day, and exe if no valid claim.

Read full topic

item.title: Princess Flirt Buff
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
NightX:

Also, most people don’t falsely claim Hunter (except Poacher)

Hence why it works. People do it more often than you think. And I can’t remember the last time the ToS Investigator outed someone either. The use of the Princess is to help with PoE by narrowing down suspects. Plus she makes a good fake claim.

Read full topic

item.title: Princess Flirt Buff
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I have never seen a Princess out someone. I do see the problem with lack of claim space, but I hate playing it since it feels like a useless ability. Drunk and Butler are easily claimable as Alcoholic, Servant and Invoker. Each converted class has its fake claim built in to it. Unseen claim their original class, usually Cult do the same. Even if they don’t, they claim something their new class’s abilities can do, such as converted Psychic claiming Noble.

The biggest problem is the lack of NK claim space, but I don’t know what to do about that.

Also, most people don’t falsely claim Hunter (except Poacher)

Read full topic

item.title: Princess Flirt Buff
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Ashe:

The main reason in my opinion for The Princess not being able to see exact class types is because it makes it way harder to fake-claim as evils. What’s an NK to do when they can’t claim Prince or Hunter, and 2 Knights are already dead, but a Princess just found them to be killer type? They don’t have any options at that point.

I mean to be fair. Butler and Drunk are not fake claimable.

Read full topic

item.title: Princess Flirt Buff
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
NightX:

small

This buff is not small in the slightest. The Princess can already catch meny fake claims such as Killers claiming support and MM/CL claiming hunter ect.

Basically it would make her OP when she is fairly balenced right now. Hell she can even find some converted people such as enforcer or herbalist. Remember that every killer type is neciccaraly not a cult member.

Read full topic
